name: Boucle Ottoman
description: Handmade in the UK, the Bouclé Ottoman is upholstered in our super soft textured boucle making it the perfect place to take a seat or put your feet up. A sumptuous addition to your living space, the round ottoman is designed to be flat on the top so you can rest a tray. This versatile piece is an easy way to add the coveted boucle texture to any space. We think it's an ideal accessory to add to any living space.
